title: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
ingredients: 4 (4-ounces each) tilapia fillets (or any white fish)
1 teaspoon chili powder (more or less to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water.
Clean and chop onion, cilantro, and cabbage. Mix in a bowl and set aside. https://www.myplate.gov/recipes/fish-tacos 1/5
